name: Rebreathe
description:
Rebreathe is a little toy that reacts to you breathing.

Hold your mouse to a part of your body that moves when you breathe and then breath deep, in and out, slowly.

Breathing helps me stay calm sometimes and this did also but I made myself lightheaded once so be careful!

Thanks for checking this out, this game (and it's music) was made by me, Tuilelaith Doherty and you can find me on twitter @tuilelaith_

If you run into any issues or have any comments contact me @tuilelaith_ on twitter or at tuilelaith.doherty@gmail.com but if you have a technical issue I might not be able to help you, sorry!
